summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting certification of an AT&T record from 2006. The email includes attachments referencing a CD with a specific file code and date.

persons.name: Andrew
persons.context: The sender of the email requesting certification of an AT&T record from 2006, working in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: AT&T Record Creation
events.description: The date associated with the AT&T record contained on a CD that is the subject of the certification request.

events.title: Certification Request Email
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a request to certify an AT&T record from 2006.

keyFacts: A federal prosecutor from the Southern District of New York is seeking certification of an AT&T record dated August 23, 2006.
The record is stored on a CD with the file code 229703.
The request is made via email in September 2021, indicating ongoing legal or investigative activity related to records from the mid-2000s.
